wizirt 0.0.2
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

anova(<wizirt>)

ANOVA method for wizirt objects

fit_wizirt()

Run the irt model you described

irt()

Describe the model you will run

irt_assume()

A function for checking the assumptions of IRT.

irt_item_fit()

A function used to get additional item-level information, such as ICC probabilities, and item information.

irt_model_pfa()

A function to explore reasons for person misfit.

irt_person_fit()

A function used to get additional person-level information, such as person-level fit measures and person response functions. I accidentally output plots in addition to data in one part. That will be moved to a plot method later.

irt_report()

Create a general IRT report for a test

plot(<wizirt>)

Plot method for wizirt objects

plot_wrap()

A funirction for handling large numbers of students and items in plots.

print(<wizirt>)

Plot method for wizirt objects

print(<wizirt_assume>)

Print method for wizirt assumption objects

print(<wizirt_ifa>)

Print method for wizirt item-fit objects

print(<wizirt_pfa>)

Print method for wizirt item-fit objects

wizirt()

Estimate an IRT model
